Name: Mouse Painting Master
About the game: An adventure game that decides the plot direction based on dialogue choices. Players will play an R18G painter. ——Synopsis—— The love story of a painter. You are a small well-known Pixiv painter who likes to draw bloody paintings. Everyone alienates you. So you have always hoped that someone can understand you. Until one day, the girl appeared... ——Special Note—— This story is adapted from the personal experience of my friends and does not involve any individual or group. ——Game features—— The game uses the first person and has an extremely immersive experience. In addition, there are three different endings, a very realistic and complex logical narrative network, and changes in the time of day and night, which are not useful but can be used as gimmick selling points.
